Just finished watching! 

AV were both great 10/10, BUT the text in the movie, including the main title screen, credits, and any subs, are in Russian or something. Still watchable, but you can't read some of the locations and dates.

Happy new year!
YIFY, this time, a 'thank you' with a 'but' ;)
Picture is perfect except for missing English and added Russian titles regarding locations, dates, newspapers, etc. (the source is a Russian Bluray).
Audio (English) is almost perfect (reasonable volume on TV speakers, echo barely noticeable and rare) but stops in the middle of the end credits (Russian Bluray didn't have English audio so a theater line must have been used).
Subtitles would have been great to translate these Russian titles (guess they weren't on the disc either).
I've enjoyed several YIFY releases and none had anything wrong with them but if you don't read Russian, be sure to get some English subs if you're gonna watch this rip. (The movie itself is great, BTW.)
Have a nice day.
